src:
Raker Perdana dengan DPR, Mendikbud Nadiem Dapat Pantun dari Ketua Komisi X
06 Nov 2019, 14:20 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - Ada momen menarik dalam rapat kerja (raker) perdana Komisi X DPR RI dengan Mendikbud Nadiem Makarim. Nadiem mendapat pantun khusus dari Ketua Komisi X Syaiful Huda.
"Pergi ke pasar naik ojek, tidak lupa membeli cangkul. Nadiem Makarim meninggalkan Gojek, demi mengabdi go school," kata Syaiful saat membuka raker dengan Nadiem di ruang rapat Komisi X, kompleks MPR/DPR, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Sontak suasana di ruang rapat Komisi X menjadi cair. Bahkan, ada salah satu anggota Komisi X yang menilai pantun Syaiful 'maksa'.
"Ya kan school belangkangnya 'kul', sama dengan cangkul," sebut Syaiful disambut tawa Nadiem dan anggota Komisi X yang hadir.
Nadiem pun mengapresiasi pantun Syaiful. "Terima kasih Pak Huda, Pak Pimpinan, saya suka sekali," ujar Nadiem.
Raker kemudian dilanjutkan. Syaiful selaku pimpinan raker mempersilakan Nadiem berbicara.

(zak/mae)
text:
Prime Coordination Meeting with the Parliament, Minister of Education and Culture Nadiem Received Rule from Chair of Commission X
06 Nov 2019, 14:20 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - There was an interesting moment in the inaugural working meeting of the House of Representatives Commission X with the Minister of Education and Culture Nadiem Makarim. Nadiem received a special poem from Commission X Chairman Syaiful Huda.
"Going to the market to ride a motorcycle taxi, do not forget to buy a hoe. Nadiem Makarim left Gojek, in order to serve go school," said Syaiful when opening a meeting with Nadiem in the Commission X meeting room, MPR / DPR complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11) / 2019).
Suddenly the atmosphere in the Commission X meeting room became liquid. One member of Commission X even considered Syaiful's poetry 'maksa'.
"Yes, the culinary school is 'kul', the same as a hoe," said Syaiful, welcomed by the laughter of Nadiem and members of Commission X who were present.
Nadiem also appreciated Syaiful's poetry. "Thank you Mr. Huda, Mr. Chairman, I love it," said Nadiem.
The meeting then continued. Syaiful as the leader of the working meeting invited Nadiem to speak.

(zak / mae)
